nodes.text: Phil Noto is an American comic book artist who has provided Books-A-Million exclusive variant covers for issues of Marvel Comics' Star Wars, Darth Vader, Princess Leia, and Kanan series.

He has also drawn covers for Del Rey's Celebration sampler, Scholastic's Princess Leia: Royal Rebel, the first issues of Marvel's Shattered Empire miniseries, Vader Down crossover event, and The Force Awakens comic adaptation, as well as provided cover and interior art for Disney–Lucasfilm Press' junior novels, The Weapon of a Jedi, Moving Target, Smuggler's Run, and Before the Awakening.
On July 10, 2015, it was announced that Noto would pencil Gerry Duggan's Chewbacca miniseries.
On January 14, 2016, it was announced that Noto would be penciling Star Wars: Poe Dameron for an April release.
